toast.warning.svgBgExperimental: SVG with background image is experimental and might not render perfectly in all viewers.
toast.warning.svgFrameNotSupported: SVG download does not currently support frames. Frame will be omitted.
toast.error.shareCreateBlobError: Could not create QR code image for sharing.

toast.shareNotSupported.title: Sharing Not Supported

toast.customizationReset.description: QR Code appearance, logo, background and frame settings reset to defaults.

scannerDialog.description: Point your camera at a QR code, or upload/paste an image.
scannerDialog.permissionDenied.title: Camera Access Denied
scannerDialog.permissionDenied.descripti: Please enable camera permissions in your browser settings to use the scanner.
scannerDialog.cameraRequired.title: Camera Access Required
scannerDialog.cameraRequired.description: Please allow camera access to use this feature. If you've denied it, you may need to adjust your browser settings.
scannerDialog.scanImage.canvasError: Could not initialize image scanning canvas.
scannerDialog.scanImage.notFoundDescript: No QR code could be detected in the uploaded image.

scannerDialog.pasteNotSupported: Pasting images from clipboard is not supported or permitted by your browser.

scannerDialog.pasteTip: (Or simply paste an image with Ctrl+V / Cmd+V)
